pages.name: Morganite
pages.text: A gem that can create many decorative blocks, see page 3 for recipes.

$(l)Recipes$()$(br)To make a stone hand pedestal, put a block of stone into her hand.$(br)To make a diamond lattice block, put iron bars into her hand and a Chroma color of your choosing into her inventory.$(br)To make diamond glass, put a glass block in her hand and a Chroma color of your choosing into her inventory.$(br)To make an uncolored phosphorus lamp, put a redstone lamp in her hand and one cluster of selenite in her inventory.$(br)To make colored phosphorus lamps, put an uncolored phosphorus lamp into her hand and a Chroma color of your choosing in her inventory.
